description:
The non instance related notifications (e.g. service.update, compute.exception) is missing from the notification devref [1]. It seems that the doc generation does not pick up those notifications.

[1] http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/notifications.html
title: missing samples from the notification dev-ref

comments.content:
The non instance related notifications (e.g. service.update, compute.exception) is missing from the notification devref [1]. It seems that the doc generation does not pick up those notifications.

[1] http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/notifications.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/396272
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/396272
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=b8897aba72497548934c4c9bb5a107c027bf0674
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit b8897aba72497548934c4c9bb5a107c027bf0674
Author: Balazs Gibizer <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Nov 10 15:52:32 2016 +0100

    Fix notification doc generator
    
    The doc generator only picked up the event types related to instance
    actions because the doc generator looked up the registered notification
    classes only. Until now, only the instance related notifications were
    imported in the doc generation environment so the other notification
    classes were not registered.
    
    This commit explicitly imports the modules that defines the notification
    classes to make the doc complete.
    
    Change-Id: I269e05ddb62ec6c6cc7f7922c1344186ccf850d1
    Closes-bug: #1640818
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 15.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
